title: What songs / category do you listen to while playing?
body:
Mine is chill, cause then I'm not full on hardcore :P
My favourite chill 4 me is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcZ46vLGRws&index=3&list=PLvlw_ICcAI4dXql41zUwAY2FnsCIzT5b-

replies.body: Mostly metal, but thats my usual music anyway
